refnamediv.refpurpose: Control signals based on held segments.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Generate control signal consisiting of held segments delimited by two or more specified points. The entire envelope can be looped at time-variant rate. Each segment coordinate can also be varied at k-rate.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ksig lpsholdp kphase, ktrig, ktime0, kvalue0 [, ktime1] [, kvalue1] \ [, ktime2] [, kvalue2] [...]

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: ktime0 ...ktimeN - times of points expessed in fraction of a cycle

lpsholdp opcode is similar to lpshold; the only difference is that, instead of frequency, a time-variant phase is required. If you use a phasor to get the phase value, you will have a behaviour identical to lpshold, but interesting results can be achieved when using phases having non-linear motions, making lpsholdp more powerful and general than lpshold.
